name: Robot Battletech Online
description:
There is a 3025 year, the galaxy is drawn into a cycle of eternal war unleashed by noble houses, throwing into battle battle machines Battle Mechs. Take under your command a detachment of pilots and try to survive in a brutal interstellar civil war. Upgrade your base, contract with feudal lords, repair and maintain your park, develop and use devastating tactics to defeat enemies on the battlefields.

Use terrain features, wisely choose positions, weapons and special abilities to outwit and replay enemies.
Drove outer space, carrying out missions and strengthening your reputation among noble houses and local factions.

Immerse yourself in the history of the overthrown ruler who unleashed a brutal war to regain his throne with the support of your company of mercenaries.

Compete on your own with friends!
In the game you can fight with opponents online!
